thread.title: Loving my Leggings
thread.title_full: Fabletics reviewed by Loving my Leggings

author: Loving my Leggings
title: Loving my Leggings
text:
To date, I have ordered at least a dozen full outfits and multiple pairs of individual leggings. At 5'1", 34DDD bust, I typically have a really difficult time finding clothes that fit properly. I want workout clothes that are comfortable and cute without looking overly provocative, Fabletics delivers every time! Most outfits are cute enough to wear while running errands, lounging, and working out. I even wear the leggings to work. The only adjustment they need to make is adding a line of sports bras that are actually supportive and true to size for more top-heavy women.
I highly recommend ordering from Fabletics - you won't be disappointed!
